articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Meets Chinese Corporation Officials
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Chinese Corporation Officials 
    Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met and had a friendly talk with Teng Fuquan, general director of the Yaohua Glass Group Corporation of China, which is participating in the construction of the Taean Friendship Glass Factory, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
 On hand were Tong Jong Ho, minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industries, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Yong Sul,
vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and other officials concerned and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy.
  At the meeting the general director expressed his will to make a positive contribution to completing as early as possible the construction of the Taean Friendship Glass Factory now under way under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.

Briefing on Swedish Products Held
articles.content:
Briefing on Swedish Products Held 
    Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A briefing on products of the Atlas Copco Group of Sweden participating in the 8th Pyongyang International Commodity Fair was held at Yanggakdo International Hotel on May 18 and 19.
 Present there were officials in the fields of the metal and machine-building industry, extractive, electricity and coal industries and foreign delegations to the fair.    
 A briefing was made on the scientific and technical specifications of various types of equipment including mining machines, generators and compressors produced by the Atlas Copco Group.

Visits
    Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A Chinese delegation headed by Zheng Yu Zhuo arrived here today to participate in the 44th meeting of the DPRK-China Border River Transport Cooperation Committee.
 Roberto Vasquez Medina, executive secretary of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, arrived here Thursday.
